chapter.group.name: Tutorial
chapter.tutorial.title: How to survival in sea
quest.tutorial.description.getwood: Catch driftwood through fishing and make it into wooden planks
quest.tutorial.description.getgoggle: Use the wood you caught to make goggles!
quest.tutorial.description.getoxygentank: Goggles alone won't be enough for oxygen, Let's make an oxygen tank too
quest.tutorial.check.gotowarmocean: Use floatter and ship helm you received as quest rewards to build your own ship
quest.tutorial.subtitle.gotowarmocean: Let's Go to the Warm Ocean
quest.tutorial.description.gotowarmocean: Reaching the destination isn't the only goal. Dont slack on looting items
chapter2.group.name: Upgrade Equipment
chapter2.main.title: Tool Upgrades
quest.main.subtitle.fisher: I want to be a fisherman
quest.main.description.diver: There are 2 ways to gather resources. One of them is diving
quest.main.description.tacklebox: Use the tackle box to add hook, bobber, fishing line, and worm
quest.main.description.worm_farm: Right-click on the worm farm with fish to get worms
quest.main.description.fishing_line: You can dye bobbers like leather armor
quest.main.description.bobber: you can dye bobbers like leather armor
quest.main.subtitle.allfishing_line: Collect All Colors of Fishing Lines
quest.main.description.allfishing_line: You cannot obtain cactus in the world
quest.main.subtitle.hiddenline: Cactus, used for green dye, can only be found in deserts
quest.main.description.hiddenline: You have collected all the fishing lines
quest.main.description.allbobber: You cannot obtain cocoa beans in this world
quest.main.subtitle.hiddenbobber: Cocoa beans, used for brown dye, can only be found in jungles
quest.main.description.hiddenbobber: You have collected all the bobbers
quest.main.description.allhook: You have collected all hooks, except for one..
quest.main.description.hiddenhook: It is presumed to be a gift from a distant desert
quest.main.description.copperoxygen: Copper is the only emement that have eyes, because is can CU
quest.main.title.diamondarmor: When Almond dies, it become Diamond
chapter3.main.title: Preparation for Battle
quest.main.description.piglin: Summon the ship a bit away for the base! The base might get destroyed
quest.main.description.guardian: There are a total of 3 Elder Guardians in the OCean Monument
quest.main.description.trident: You can craft the trident by combining trident fragment, obtained from the Ocean Monument or Elder Guardians, with prismarine shards
quest.main.description.neptunium: You can craft it by combining the Heart of the Sea with iron and gold or by fishing. The Heart of the Sea can also be obtained from Elder Guardians or through Fishing
quest.main.description.neptuniumarmor: It will be a long journey
quest.main.description.abysseye: Atlantis ins't the only Sunken City
quest.main.description.ingredient1: Can be obtained by Defeating Deepling or Drowned
quest.main.description.ingredient2: Can be obtained by Defeating Deepling Priest in Sunken City
quest.main.description.ingredient3: Can be obatined by Defeating Coralssus in Sunken City
quest.main.description.ingredient4: Diamonds spawn only deep oceans (exculding warm oceans)
quest.main.description.ingredient5: Can be obtained by Looting treasure, fishing, or defeating Elder Guardians
quest.main.description.ingredient6: Emeralds spawn only in warm oceans
quest.main.description.ingredient7: Irons spawn only in shallow oceans
quest.main.description.ingredient8: Amethyst can be obtained through trading with Piglins
quest.main.description.ingredient9: Gold spawns only in deep or warm oceans
quest.main.subtitle.sacrifice: Create a Scrificial Offering for Leviathan
quest.main.description.sacrifice: Place it on the Abyssal ALtar to summon Leviathan
quest.main.subtitle.end: Breaking the Curse of the Sea
quest.main.description: You are freed from the curse of the ocean. Congratulations!
